title: My Projects
subtitle: A showcase of my latest full-stack and front-end web applications built with modern frameworks.

projects.discription: An e-commerce site allowing users to browse, view details, and manage cart items for a smooth shopping experience.
A full-featured social media app supporting posts, comments, likes, and media sharing with authentication and authorization.
A photo-sharing app with authentication, privacy control, folder organization, and full CRUD functionality.
A secure CRUD application with authentication, password recovery, and theme switcher supporting file attachments.
A simple yet efficient contact manager allowing users to save, edit, and delete contacts with persistent storage.
A job portal for employers to post jobs and seekers to apply, featuring authentication and role-based access.
A task management app with add, edit, and delete features for keeping track of daily tasks.
